Class Maze

java.lang.Object
model.Maze
public class Maze extends Object
Represents a Maze created by the user. Stores maze dimensions, game elements, and question-related settings.

  • Constructor Details

    • Maze

      public Maze(int width, int height, int num_crocodiles, int crocodile_damage, int num_medkits, int medkit_health, int question_time, int question_damage, int num_questions, int[][] map)
      Constructs a Maze with specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      width - Width of the maze.
      height - Height of the maze.
      num_crocodiles - Number of crocodiles in the maze.
      crocodile_damage - Damage each crocodile causes.
      num_medkits - Number of medkits in the maze.
      medkit_health - Amount of health each medkit restores.
      question_time - Time allowed for each question.
      question_damage - Damage taken for wrong answers.
      num_questions - Number of questions in the maze.
      map - Initial maze matrix.

  • Method Details

    • generateDisposition

      public void generateDisposition()
      Generates a new random disposition within the maze. The disposition matrix will place medkits and crocodiles randomly.

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()
      Returns the width of the maze.
